name: Alchemist (itch) (CaptainVikkus)
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Created by Flavio Araujo Silva and Jake Treleaven

You play as an alchemist in a suit of armor, exploring caves on an alien planet. There are powerups that can be picked up along the way. Join together unique combinations of the powerups to overcome the challenges this planet has to offer.

Controls:

WASD to move

Spacebar to Jump

Shift/Left click to use powerups

Esc/P to pause
